paragraphs.content: And it came to pass, that Abram fell on his face, and called upon the name of the Lord.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And it came to pass, that Abram fell on his face, and called upon the name of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: And God talked with him, saying, My people have gone astray from my precepts, and have not kept mine ordinances, which I gave unto their fathers;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And God talked with him, saying, My people have gone astray from my precepts, and have not kept mine ordinances, which I gave unto their fathers;

paragraphs.content: And they have not observed mine anointing, and the burial, or baptism wherewith I commanded them;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they have not observed mine anointing, and the burial, or baptism wherewith I commanded them;

paragraphs.content: But have turned from the commandment, and taken unto themselves the washing of children, and the blood of sprinkling;
paragraphs.contentHtml: But have turned from the commandment, and taken unto themselves the washing of children, and the blood of sprinkling;

paragraphs.content: And have said that the blood of the righteous Abel was shed for sins; and have not known wherein they are accountable before me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And have said that the blood of the righteous Abel was shed for sins; and have not known wherein they are accountable before me.

paragraphs.content: But as for thee, behold, I will make my covenant with thee, and thou shalt be a father of many nations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But as for thee, behold, I will make my covenant with thee, and thou shalt be a father of many nations.

paragraphs.content: And this covenant I make, that thy children may be known among all nations. Neither shall thy name any more be called Abram, but thy name shall be called Abraham; for, a father of many nations have I made thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And this covenant I make, that thy children may be known among all nations. Neither shall thy name any more be called Abram, but thy name shall be called Abraham; for, a father of many nations have I made thee.

paragraphs.content: And I will make thee exceedingly fruitful, and I will make nations of thee, and kings shall come of thee, and of thy seed.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will make thee exceedingly fruitful, and I will make nations of thee, and kings shall come of thee, and of thy seed.

paragraphs.content: And I will establish a covenant of circumcision with thee, and it shall be my covenant between me and thee, and thy seed after thee, in their generations; that thou mayest know forever that children are not accountable before me until they are eight years old.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And I will establish a covenant of circumcision with thee, and it shall be my covenant between me and thee, and thy seed after thee, in their generations; that thou mayest know forever that children are not accountable before me until they are eight years old.

paragraphs.content: And thou shalt observe to keep all my covenants wherein I covenanted with thy fathers; and thou shalt keep the commandments which I have given thee with mine own mouth, and I will be a God unto thee and thy seed after thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And thou shalt observe to keep all my covenants wherein I covenanted with thy fathers; and thou shalt keep the commandments which I have given thee with mine own mouth, and I will be a God unto thee and thy seed after thee.

paragraphs.content: Then Abraham fell on his face and rejoiced, and said in his heart, There shall a child be born unto him that is an hundred years old, and Sarah that is ninety years old shall bear.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then Abraham fell on his face and rejoiced, and said in his heart, There shall a child be born unto him that is an hundred years old, and Sarah that is ninety years old shall bear.

paragraphs.content: And Abraham said unto God, Oh that Ishmael might live uprightly before thee!
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Abraham said unto God, Oh that Ishmael might live uprightly before thee!
